column4: How about from outside of IRC?
google for a website that shows you your IP
There aren't any command line tools or something for that?
It seemed that ifconfig gave different results when using DSL, reporting the IP as considered by the router, not the outside world.
Sad.  Things calmed down for a little while there.
yeah, they did.   for a while lol
yes.  wonder if AfterDeath knows about this
that was silly, i didnt kickban the guys.
